attributes.additional_details: A woman has been jailed for 14 years for beating and blinding her 11 month old baby, who she then murdered. Callum Wilson, an 11 month old baby suffered a detached retina, broken bones and bruising... and the 'person', if you dare call her that, who killed that innocent baby, has been given a life sentence, which is 14 years? IT SHOULD BE LIFE IN PRISON, UNTIL THAT MONSTER DIES. I DON'T WANT BABY KILLERS ON THE STREETS... DO YOU?
